name: Turkey-Couscous Salad With Ginger-Peach Dressing
author: Anonymous
summary: A world of global ingredients create a one-of-a-kind combination of color, taste, and texture.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon O Organics™ Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½ cup diced red bell pepper
¼ cup thinly sliced green onion
1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, well drained
¼ cup Safeway SELECT™ Seasoned Rice Vinegar
2 tablespoons O Organics™ Extra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ teaspoon finely chopped fresh garlic or garlic puree
directions: Pour 2 cups boiling water into a 4- to 5-quart casserole, bowl, or other non-plastic container with a lid
When grains are hydrated, fluff them with a fork, re-cover, and place in the refrigerator to cool for 30 minutes
When cooled, fluff and separate couscous grains again with a fork
(If making ahead, refrigerate, covered, for up to 2 days
In a blender or food processor, puree lemon juice, vinegar, oil, ginger, garlic, and peaches
Add salt and hot sauce to taste
Gently mix turkey, red bell pepper, cucumber, celery, green onion, carrot, and pineapple into cooled couscous
Stir mixture gently but thoroughly to ensure dressing is evenly distributed
